Posts.Content: Dec 13, 2009 06:15AM kat56 wrote: Good advice Fidelia.  Adillard23, I know how you feel with the surgeries!  I just had my 9th surgical biopsy (should get results tomorrow) and mixed in there-4 needle biopsies.  I do not "watch" anything-the wait drives you crazier than the discomfort of the procedure.  Stay PROACTIVE--after all we get only one life to live!  Fight for it. Good luck to you and keep us posted. Kat
Posts.Title: Dense Breast Lump adillard23 kat56

Posts.Content: Jan 23, 2010 12:00PM kat56 wrote: Navy...Best of luck to you.  Breathe in Breathe out. (yes easier said than done) Keep us  posted and PLEASE ... give a big THANK YOU to your husband for doing what he does. Sending B-9 vibes your way. Kat

Posts.Content: Dec 13, 2009 08:31AM kat56 wrote: solorzw--my opinion-go for the surgical biopsy-if you have the core biopsy and it is positive you probably will still have to have the surgical biopsy.  I say cut to the chase and get it out!  That is what I did (9 times) as each wait will make your crazier and crazier! Best of luck to you and please keep us posted! Kat
